Desc.entry: Intends to re-open the railway line from Stocksbridge to Sheffield. Aims to aid regeneration of the Stocksbridge/Deepcar area, improve employment prospects within the valley and relieve congestion on local roads. Plans to use diesel engines for a commuter service and incorporate steam facilities to promote tourism. A not-for-profit organisation providing employment, training and education facilities. Works in partnership with South Yorkshire Passenger Transport Executive, Stocksbridge Town Council, Sheffield City Council and other groups. Company limited by guarantee no 5319206.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Wed 10.30am-1pm (manned by volunteers), please call in advance before visiting
